content: What happened to the biggest pumpkin that ever existed?

I'm not aware of any specific incident involving the "biggest pumpkin that ever existed." However, I can tell you that the world record for the heaviest pumpkin was set in 2020 by Mathias Willemijns from Belgium, who grew a pumpkin weighing 1,235 kilograms (2,723 pounds). These giant pumpkins are often displayed at agricultural fairs and competitions before they are usually composted or used for other purposes. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask!
